languages.text: "Великий механизм преобразил засекреченные данные в формат, в котором вы сможете понять их без помощи техножреца". {n}Обеими руками принимая инфопластину из недр когитатора, магос протягивает ее вам.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Великий механизм преобразил засекреченные данные в формат, в котором вы сможете понять их без помощи техножреца". {n}Обеими руками принимая инфопластину из недр когитатора, магос протягивает ее вам.{/n}
traits.speaker: Nomos_Techpriest_IH-630

languages.text: "The great mechanism has transformed the secret data into a format that you can comprehend without the assistance of a servant of the Omnissiah." {n}The Tech-Priest retrieves the data-slate from the heart of the cogitator, holding it with both hands, and passes it to you.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Великий механизм преобразил засекреченные данные в формат, в котором вы сможете понять их без помощи техножреца". {n}Обеими руками принимая инфопластину из недр когитатора, магос протягивает ее вам.{/n}

traits.speaker: Nomos_Techpriest_IH-630

traits.locale_text: "The great mechanism has transformed the secret data into a format that you can comprehend without the assistance of a servant of the Omnissiah." {n}The Tech-Priest retrieves the data-slate from the heart of the cogitator, holding it with both hands, and passes it to you.{/n}
traits.speaker: Nomos_Techpriest_IH-630

languages.text: 「偉大なるメカニズムは、この秘密データを、万機神の下僕の助けを借りずに理解できる形式に変換しました」{n}技術司祭は考算機の中心からデータスレートを取り出し、両手で持ち、こちらに手渡す。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The great mechanism has transformed the secret data into a format that you can comprehend without the assistance of a servant of the Omnissiah." {n}The Tech-Priest retrieves the data-slate from the heart of the cogitator, holding it with both hands, and passes it to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「偉大なるメカニズムは、この秘密データを、万機神の下僕の助けを借りずに理解できる形式に変換しました」{n}技術司祭は考算機の中心からデータスレートを取り出し、両手で持ち、こちらに手渡す。{/n}
traits.speaker: Nomos_Techpriest_IH-630

languages.text: « Le grand mécanisme a converti les données secrètes dans un format que vous pourrez comprendre sans l'aide d'un serviteur de l'Omnimessie. » {n}Le technoprêtre retire la plaque de données du cogitateur puis, des deux mains, vous la transmet.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The great mechanism has transformed the secret data into a format that you can comprehend without the assistance of a servant of the Omnissiah." {n}The Tech-Priest retrieves the data-slate from the heart of the cogitator, holding it with both hands, and passes it to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Le grand mécanisme a converti les données secrètes dans un format que vous pourrez comprendre sans l'aide d'un serviteur de l'Omnimessie. » {n}Le technoprêtre retire la plaque de données du cogitateur puis, des deux mains, vous la transmet.{/n}
traits.speaker: Nomos_Techpriest_IH-630

languages.text: “伟大的机械装置已经将加密数据转化为另一种格式，您无需欧姆尼塞亚仆人的协助，也能理解其中的内容。”{n}技术神甫从沉思者的核心处取出了数据板，用双手捧着，递给了你。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The great mechanism has transformed the secret data into a format that you can comprehend without the assistance of a servant of the Omnissiah." {n}The Tech-Priest retrieves the data-slate from the heart of the cogitator, holding it with both hands, and passes it to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “伟大的机械装置已经将加密数据转化为另一种格式，您无需欧姆尼塞亚仆人的协助，也能理解其中的内容。”{n}技术祭司从思考器的核心处取出了数据板，用双手捧着，递给了你。{/n}
traits.speaker: Nomos_Techpriest_IH-630

languages.text: «El gran mecanismo ha transformado los datos secretos a un formato que podrá comprender sin la asistencia de un sirviente del Omnissiah». {n}El tecnosacerdote recupera la tablilla de datos del corazón del cogitador, la sostiene con ambas manos y te hace entrega de ella.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The great mechanism has transformed the secret data into a format that you can comprehend without the assistance of a servant of the Omnissiah." {n}The Tech-Priest retrieves the data-slate from the heart of the cogitator, holding it with both hands, and passes it to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «El gran mecanismo ha transformado los datos secretos a un formato que podrá comprender sin la asistencia de un sirviente del Omnissiah». {n}El tecnosacerdote recupera la tablilla de datos del corazón del cogitador, la sostiene con ambas manos y te hace entrega de ella.{/n}
traits.speaker: Nomos_Techpriest_IH-630

languages.text: "Der große Mechanismus hat die geheimen Daten in ein Format konvertiert, das Ihr ohne die Unterstützung eines Dieners des Omnissiah verstehen könnt." {n}Der Techpriester nimmt den Datablock aus dem Herzen des Cogitators. Er hält ihn in beiden Händen und überreicht ihn dir feierlich.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The great mechanism has transformed the secret data into a format that you can comprehend without the assistance of a servant of the Omnissiah." {n}The Tech-Priest retrieves the data-slate from the heart of the cogitator, holding it with both hands, and passes it to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Der große Mechanismus hat die geheimen Daten in ein Format konvertiert, das Ihr ohne die Unterstützung eines Dieners des Omnissiah verstehen könnt." {n}Der Techpriester nimmt den Datablock aus dem Herzen des Cogitators. Er hält ihn in beiden Händen und überreicht ihn dir feierlich.{/n}
traits.speaker: Nomos_Techpriest_IH-630

languages.text: "Yüce mekanizma, gizli verileri Hermesih'in hizmetkârlarına lüzum duymadan anlayabileceğiniz bir biçime çevirdi." {n}Tekno Rahip, kavramsayarın kalbinden aldığı databelayı iki eliyle tutarak sana uzatıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The great mechanism has transformed the secret data into a format that you can comprehend without the assistance of a servant of the Omnissiah." {n}The Tech-Priest retrieves the data-slate from the heart of the cogitator, holding it with both hands, and passes it to you.{/n}
